""SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[ProductId], CASE
    WHEN [n].[ProductId] IS NOT NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [n.Product].[Name], [n.Product].[CategoryId], [n.Product].[Image], [n.Product].[Price], [n.Product].[PromotionPrice], [n.Product].[OriginalPrice], [n.Product].[Description], [n.Product].[Content], [n.Product].[HomeFlag], [n.Product].[HotFlag], [n.Product].[ViewCount], [n.Product].[Tags], [n.Product].[Unit], CASE
    WHEN [n.Product].[CategoryId] IS NOT NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Status], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [n.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [n.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [n.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [n.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [n.Product].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [n.Product].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [n.Product].[Status] AS [Status0], [n].[Path], [n].[Caption], [n.Product].[Id]
FROM [ProductImages] AS [n]
INNER JOIN [Products] AS [n.Product] ON [n].[ProductId] = [n.Product].[Id]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [n.Product.ProductCategory] ON [n.Product].[CategoryId] = [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]

ORDER BY [n].[Id], [n.Product].[Id], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)

""SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[ProductId], CASE
    WHEN [n].[ProductId] IS NOT NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [n.Product].[Name], [n.Product].[CategoryId], [n.Product].[Image], [n.Product].[Price], [n.Product].[PromotionPrice], [n.Product].[OriginalPrice], [n.Product].[Description], [n.Product].[Content], [n.Product].[HomeFlag], [n.Product].[HotFlag], [n.Product].[ViewCount], [n.Product].[Tags], [n.Product].[Unit], CASE
    WHEN [n.Product].[CategoryId] IS NOT NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Status], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [n.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [n.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [n.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [n.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [n.Product].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [n.Product].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [n.Product].[Status] AS [Status0], [n].[Path], [n].[Caption], [n.Product].[Id]
FROM [ProductImages] AS [n]
INNER JOIN [Products] AS [n.Product] ON [n].[ProductId] = [n.Product].[Id]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [n.Product.ProductCategory] ON [n.Product].[CategoryId] = [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]
WHERE [n].[ProductId] = @__productId_0
ORDER BY [n].[Id], [n.Product].[Id], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)
2018-11-23T15:11:23.8188555+07:00 0HLIH3BNQH8FL:00000006 [INF] Executed DbCommand ("20"ms) [Parameters=["@__productId_0='?' (DbType = Int32)"], CommandType='Text', CommandTimeout='30']"
""SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [n.Product.ProductTags].[Id] AS [Id2], [n.Product.ProductTags].[ProductId], [n.Product.ProductTags].[TagId], CASE
    WHEN [n.Product.ProductTags].[TagId] IS NOT NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [dto.Tag].[Name], [dto.Tag].[Type]
FROM [ProductTags] AS [n.Product.ProductTags]
INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [dto.Tag] ON [n.Product.ProductTags].[TagId] = [dto.Tag].[Id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[Id], [n.Product0].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [ProductImages] AS [n0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [n.Product0] ON [n0].[ProductId] = [n.Product0].[Id]

END, [n.Product].[Name], [n.Product].[CategoryId], [n.Product].[Image], [n.Product].[Price], [n.Product].[PromotionPrice], [n.Product].[OriginalPrice], [n.Product].[Description], [n.Product].[Content], [n.Product].[HomeFlag], [n.Product].[HotFlag], [n.Product].[ViewCount], [n.Product].[Tags], [n.Product].[Unit], CASE

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[Status], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [n.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [n.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [n.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [n.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [n.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [n.Product].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [n.Product].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [n.Product].[Status] AS [Status0], [n].[Path], [n].[Caption], [n.Product].[Id]
FROM [ProductImages] AS [n]

    FROM [ProductImages] AS [n0]

    FROM [ProductImages] AS [n1]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [n.Product1] ON [n1].[ProductId] = [n.Product1].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [n.Product.ProductCategory1] ON [n.Product1].[CategoryId] = [n.Product.ProductCategory1].[Id]

END, [dto.Tag0].[Name], [dto.Tag0].[Type]

SELECT @@ROWCOUNT;

DELETE FROM [ProductImages]
WHERE [Id] = @p1;
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT;

DELETE FROM [ProductImages]
WHERE [Id] = @p2;
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT;

DELETE FROM [ProductImages]
WHERE [Id] = @p3;
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT;

DECLARE @inserted4 TABLE ([Id] int, [_Position] [int]);
MERGE [ProductImages] USING (
VALUES (@p4, @p5, @p6, 0),
(@p7, @p8, @p9, 1),
(@p10, @p11, @p12, 2),
(@p13, @p14, @p15, 3)) AS i ([Caption], [Path], [ProductId], _Position) ON 1=0
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ([Caption], [Path], [ProductId])
VALUES (i.[Caption], i.[Path], i.[ProductId])
OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position
INTO @inserted4;

SELECT [t].[Id] FROM [ProductImages] t
INNER JOIN @inserted4 i ON ([t].[Id] = [i].[Id])
ORDER BY [i].[_Position];" (0723d8ff)

VALUES (@p4, @p5, @p6, 0),
(@p7, @p8, @p9, 1),
(@p10, @p11, @p12, 2),

""SELECT [t2].[Id], [t2].[Id0], [t2].[Id1], [n.Product.ProductCategory.Products.ProductTags].[Id] AS [Id3], [n.Product.ProductCategory.Products.ProductTags].[ProductId], [n.Product.ProductCategory.Products.ProductTags].[TagId], CASE
    WHEN [n.Product.ProductCategory.Products.ProductTags].[TagId] IS NOT NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [dto.Tag0].[Name], [dto.Tag0].[Type]
FROM [ProductTags] AS [n.Product.ProductCategory.Products.ProductTags]
INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [dto.Tag0] ON [n.Product.ProductCategory.Products.ProductTags].[TagId] = [dto.Tag0].[Id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [n.Product.ProductCategory.Products0].[Id] AS [Id1]
    FROM [Products] AS [n.Product.ProductCategory.Products0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [n2].[Id], [n.Product.ProductCategory2].[Id] AS [Id0]
        FROM [ProductImages] AS [n2]
        INNER JOIN [Products] AS [n.Product2] ON [n2].[ProductId] = [n.Product2].[Id]
        INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [n.Product.ProductCategory2] ON [n.Product2].[CategoryId] = [n.Product.ProductCategory2].[Id]
        WHERE [n2].[ProductId] = @__productId_0
    ) AS [t1] ON [n.Product.ProductCategory.Products0].[CategoryId] = [t1].[Id0]
) AS [t2] ON [n.Product.ProductCategory.Products.ProductTags].[ProductId] = [t2].[Id1]
ORDER BY [t2].[Id], [t2].[Id0], [t2].[Id1]" (0723d8ff)

END, [dto.Tag].[Name], [dto.Tag].[Type]
FROM [ProductTags] AS [x.Products.ProductTags]
INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [dto.Tag] ON [x.Products.ProductTags].[TagId] = [dto.Tag].[Id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[ParentId], [t0].[Id], [x.Products0].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [Products] AS [x.Products0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [x1].[ParentId], [x1].[Id]
        FROM [ProductCategories] AS [x1]
    ) AS [t0] ON [x.Products0].[CategoryId] = [t0].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [x.Products.ProductTags].[ProductId] = [t1].[Id0]
ORDER BY [t1].[ParentId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0]" (0723d8ff)

MERGE [ProductQuantities] USING (
VALUES (@p5, @p6, @p7, @p8, 0),
(@p9, @p10, @p11, @p12, 1),
(@p13, @p14, @p15, @p16, 2),
(@p17, @p18, @p19, @p20, 3),
(@p21, @p22, @p23, @p24, 4)) AS i ([ColorId], [ProductId], [Quantity], [SizeId], _Position) ON 1=0

OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position
INTO @inserted5;
